item.title: サードパーティCookieの置き換え、AppleのATTなどについて、Googleのプライバシーサンドボックス製品管理担当シニアディレクター、Victor Wong氏にインタビュー（Thomas Germain/Gizmodo)
item.description:
Thomas Germain / Gizmodo:
An interview with Victor Wong, Google's senior director of product management for Privacy Sandbox, about replacing third-party cookies, Apple's ATT, and more  —  To replace the cookie in Chrome and Android, Google has an offering for the world called “Privacy Sandbox.”  Here's an exclusive peek into how it will work.

item.title: フォックス・コーポレーション、ルー・ドブスのシドニー・パウエルへのインタビューで行われた2020年選挙の虚偽の主張について、ベネズエラの実業家マジェド・ハリルによる名誉毀損訴訟を和解（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Fox Corp settles a defamation suit by Venezuelan businessman Majed Khalil over false 2020 election claims made in a Lou Dobbs interview with Sidney Powell  —  Majed Khalil had sued Fox and former host Lou Dobbs in 2021 over claims made about the 2020 presidential election.

item.title: ダラスを拠点とするFloodlight Newsのジャーナリスト、アマル・アーメッド氏とのQ&A：石油・ガスに優しいテキサス州のコミュニティにおける環境正義の取材について（Andrew McCormick/Columbia Journalism ...)
item.description:
Andrew McCormick / Columbia Journalism Review:
Q&A with Amal Ahmed, a Dallas-based journalist with Floodlight News, on covering environmental justice for communities in the often oil-and-gas friendly Texas  —  b … What led you to focus on climate change as a reporter?  —  I was an intern at Texas Monthly when Hurricane Harvey hit in 2017.

item.title: Twitterでは、Substackのリンクを含むツイートにいいね、リツイート、返信ができるようになったが、「Substack」で検索しても「ニュースレター」の結果が出るだけだ（Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)

Igor Bonifacic / Engadget:
In a reversal, Twitter lets users like, retweet, and reply to tweets with Substack links, but searches with “Substack” still just give results for “newsletter”  —  In a reversal of a limitation the platform put in place earlier in the week, Twitter is once again allowing users …

item.title: Twitterが@BBCアカウントに「Government Funded Media」のラベルを貼っているが、@BBCNewsやその他のニュース関連アカウントには貼っていない、BBCはTwitterに不正確なラベルの変更を要請（Jake Kanter/Deadline)
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Twitter labels the @BBC account “Government Funded Media,” but not @BBCNews and other news-related accounts; the BBC asks Twitter to change the inaccurate label  —  UPDATE: The BBC has said it is speaking to Twitter in an effort to change the “government funded media” tag on its official account.

item.title: ウォールストリート・ジャーナルのEICエマ・タッカー（元サンデー・タイムズ編集長）のプロフィール。マードック社内の政治とエヴァン・ガーシュコビッチを解放するための闘いをナビゲートする（Shawn McCreesh/New York Magazine
item.description:
Shawn McCreesh / New York Magazine:
A profile of Wall Street Journal EIC Emma Tucker, the former Sunday Times editor, on navigating internal Murdoch politics and the fight to free Evan Gershkovich  —  Emma Tucker got her first inkling that something bad might be happening on the afternoon of March 29.

item.title: テストによると、イーロン・マスクのTwitterは、プーチンを含むクレムリンに関連するアカウントの制限を解除し、一部はFor Youフィードに表示され、2022年4月の方針を覆した（James Titcomb/Telegraph）。
item.description:
James Titcomb / Telegraph:
Tests show Elon Musk's Twitter removed limits on Kremlin-linked accounts, including Putin's, with some showing in For You feeds, reversing an April 2022 policy  —  Elon Musk's social media site lifts restrictions on Kremlin-linked tweets  —  Twitter has removed restrictions on Kremlin-linked accounts …

Christopher Grimes / Financial Times:
Sources detail WBD CEO David Zaslav's efforts to revive the studio by backing classic franchises, investing in new films, repairing ties with talent, and more  —  After a painful first year, CEO David Zaslav is backing classic franchises and investing in new films to revive the legendary studio

The Guardian:
Russian media: the Federal Security Service formally charged Evan Gershkovich with carrying out espionage for the US and the WSJ reporter denied all accusations  —  Wall Street Journal reporter denies charges, while US Senate leaders issue bipartisan call for his release

Matt Novak / Forbes:
Elon Musk claims Substack links “were never blocked” and Substack tried to “download a massive portion of the Twitter database to bootstrap their Twitter clone”  —  Elon Musk broke his silence about the Twitter CEO's conflict with the online publishing site Substack …

Aidan McLaughlin / Mediaite:
Twitter replaces the week-old “US state-affiliated media” label on NPR's account with a new label describing the nonprofit media company as “Government Funded”  —  Twitter removed the “state-affiliated media” label it had affixed on NPR's account this week …

NEW: Label on NPR's main account changed to “government funded,” and Elon tells me Twitter is “applying it to a larger number of institutions.”

Twitter starts marking Substack links with a warning stating the link “has been identified by Twitter or our partners as being potentially spammy or unsafe”  —  Twitter has started marking links to Substack as unsafe.  If you click on a link on Twitter with substack.com in the URL …
